description: The DeleteDBInstance action deletes a previously provisioned DB instance. When you delete a DB instance, all automated backups for that instance are deleted and can't be recovered. Manual DB snapshots of the DB instance to be deleted by DeleteDBInstance are not deleted. If you request a final DB snapshot the status of the Amazon Neptune DB instance is deleting until the DB snapshot is created. The API action DescribeDBInstance is used to monitor the status of this operation. The action can't be canceled or reverted once submitted. Note that when a DB instance is in a failure state and has a status of failed, incompatible-restore, or incompatible-network, you can only delete it when the SkipFinalSnapshot parameter is set to true. You can't delete a DB instance if it is the only instance in the DB cluster, or if it has deletion protection enabled.

parameters.name: DBInstanceIdentifier
parameters.description: The DB instance identifier for the DB instance to be deleted. This parameter isn't case-sensitive. Constraints: Must match the name of an existing DB instance.

parameters.name: SkipFinalSnapshot
parameters.description: Determines whether a final DB snapshot is created before the DB instance is deleted. If true is specified, no DBSnapshot is created. If false is specified, a DB snapshot is created before the DB instance is deleted. Note that when a DB instance is in a failure state and has a status of --failed', --incompatible-restore', or --incompatible-network', it can only be deleted when the SkipFinalSnapshot parameter is set to 'true'. Specify true when deleting a Read Replica. Default: false.

parameters.name: FinalDBSnapshotIdentifier
parameters.description: The DBSnapshotIdentifier of the new DBSnapshot created when SkipFinalSnapshot is set to false. Constraints: Must be 1 to 255 letters or numbers. First character must be a letter Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens Cannot be specified when deleting a Read Replica.

nested_items.name: DBInstance
nested_items.description: Contains the details of an Amazon Neptune DB instance.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Contains a user-supplied database identifier. This identifier is the unique key that identifies a DB instance.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceClass
nested_items.description: Contains the name of the compute and memory capacity class of the DB instance.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: Provides the name of the database engine to be used for this DB instance.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies the current state of this database.

nested_items.name: MasterUsername
nested_items.description: Not supported by Neptune.

nested_items.name: DBName
nested_items.description: The database name.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: Specifies the DNS address of the DB instance.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: Specifies the port that the database engine is listening on.

nested_items.name: HostedZoneId
nested_items.description: Specifies the ID that Amazon Route 53 assigns when you create a hosted zone.

nested_items.name: AllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: Not supported by Neptune.

nested_items.name: InstanceCreateTime
nested_items.description: Provides the date and time the DB instance was created.

nested_items.name: PreferredBackupWindow
nested_items.description: Specifies the daily time range during which automated backups are created if automated backups are enabled, as determined by the BackupRetentionPeriod.

nested_items.name: BackupRetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: Specifies the number of days for which automatic DB snapshots are retained.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroups
nested_items.description: Provides List of DB security group elements containing only DBSecurityGroup.Name and DBSecurityGroup.Status subelements.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: VpcSecurityGroups
nested_items.description: Provides a list of VPC security group elements that the DB instance belongs to.

nested_items.name: VpcSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The name of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: DBParameterGroups
nested_items.description: Provides the list of DB parameter groups applied to this DB instance.
CreateDBInstance.
DeleteDBInstance.
ModifyDBInstance.
RebootDBInstance.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the Availability Zone the DB instance is located in.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroup
nested_items.description: Specifies information on the subnet group associated with the DB instance, including the name, description, and subnets in the subnet group.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroupDescription
nested_items.description: Provides the description of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: Provides the VpcId of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: SubnetGroupStatus
nested_items.description: Provides the status of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: Contains a list of  Subnet elements.

nested_items.name: SubnetIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the identifier of the subnet.

nested_items.name: SubnetAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: Specifies the EC2 Availability Zone that the subnet is in.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the availability zone.

nested_items.name: SubnetStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the subnet.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: PreferredMaintenanceWindow
nested_items.description: Specifies the weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: PendingModifiedValues
nested_items.description: Specifies that changes to the DB instance are pending. This element is only included when changes are pending. Specific changes are identified by subelements.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceClass
nested_items.description: Contains the new DBInstanceClass for the DB instance that will be applied or is currently being applied.

nested_items.name: AllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: Contains the new AllocatedStorage size for the DB instance that will be applied or is currently being applied.

nested_items.name: MasterUserPassword
nested_items.description: Not supported by Neptune.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: Specifies the pending port for the DB instance.

nested_items.name: BackupRetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: Specifies the pending number of days for which automated backups are retained.

nested_items.name: MultiAZ
nested_items.description: Indicates that the Single-AZ DB instance is to change to a Multi-AZ deployment.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates the database engine version.

nested_items.name: LicenseModel
nested_items.description: Not supported by Neptune.

nested_items.name: Iops
nested_items.description: Specifies the new Provisioned IOPS value for the DB instance that will be applied or is currently being applied.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Contains the new DBInstanceIdentifier for the DB instance that will be applied or is currently being applied.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: Not applicable. In Neptune the storage type is managed at the DB Cluster level.

nested_items.name: CACertificateIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the identifier of the CA certificate for the DB instance.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroupName
nested_items.description: The new DB subnet group for the DB instance.

nested_items.name: PendingCloudwatchLogsExports
nested_items.description: This PendingCloudwatchLogsExports structure specifies pending changes to which CloudWatch logs are enabled and which are disabled.

nested_items.name: LogTypesToEnable
nested_items.description: Log types that are in the process of being deactivated. After they are deactivated, these log types aren't exported to CloudWatch Logs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LogTypesToDisable
nested_items.description: Log types that are in the process of being enabled. After they are enabled, these log types are exported to CloudWatch Logs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LatestRestorableTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the latest time to which a database can be restored with point-in-time restore.

nested_items.name: MultiAZ
nested_items.description: Specifies if the DB instance is a Multi-AZ deployment.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates the database engine version.

nested_items.name: AutoMinorVersionUpgrade
nested_items.description: Indicates that minor version patches are applied automatically.

nested_items.name: ReadReplicaSourceDBInstanceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Contains the identifier of the source DB instance if this DB instance is a Read Replica.

nested_items.name: ReadReplicaDBInstanceIdentifiers
nested_items.description: Contains one or more identifiers of the Read Replicas associated with this DB instance.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ReadReplicaDBClusterIdentifiers
nested_items.description: Contains one or more identifiers of DB clusters that are Read Replicas of this DB instance.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LicenseModel
nested_items.description: License model information for this DB instance.

nested_items.name: Iops
nested_items.description: Specifies the Provisioned IOPS (I/O operations per second) value.

nested_items.name: OptionGroupMemberships
nested_items.description: (Not supported by Neptune)

nested_items.name: OptionGroupName
nested_items.description: Not supported by Neptune.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Not supported by Neptune.

nested_items.name: CharacterSetName
nested_items.description: (Not supported by Neptune)

nested_items.name: SecondaryAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: If present, specifies the name of the secondary Availability Zone for a DB instance with multi-AZ support.

nested_items.name: PubliclyAccessible
nested_items.description: This flag should no longer be used.

nested_items.name: StatusInfos
nested_items.description: The status of a Read Replica. If the instance is not a Read Replica, this is blank.

nested_items.name: StatusType
nested_items.description: This value is currently 'read replication.'

nested_items.name: Normal
nested_items.description: Boolean value that is true if the instance is operating normally, or false if the instance is in an error state.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the DB instance. For a StatusType of read replica, the values can be replicating, error, stopped, or terminated.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Details of the error if there is an error for the instance. If the instance is not in an error state, this value is blank.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: Specifies the storage type associated with the DB instance.

nested_items.name: TdeCredentialArn
nested_items.description: The ARN from the key store with which the instance is associated for TDE encryption.

nested_items.name: DbInstancePort
nested_items.description: Specifies the port that the DB instance listens on. If the DB instance is part of a DB cluster, this can be a different port than the DB cluster port.

nested_items.name: DBClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: If the DB instance is a member of a DB cluster, contains the name of the DB cluster that the DB instance is a member of.

nested_items.name: StorageEncrypted
nested_items.description: Not supported: The encryption for DB instances is managed by the DB cluster.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: Not supported: The encryption for DB instances is managed by the DB cluster.

nested_items.name: DbiResourceId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Region-unique, immutable identifier for the DB instance. This identifier is found in Amazon CloudTrail log entries whenever the Amazon KMS key for the DB instance is accessed.

nested_items.name: CACertificateIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the CA certificate for this DB instance.

nested_items.name: DomainMemberships
nested_items.description: Not supported.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Active Directory Domain.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the DB instance's Active Directory Domain membership, such as joined, pending-join, failed etc).

nested_items.name: FQDN
nested_items.description: The fully qualified domain name of the Active Directory Domain.

nested_items.name: IAMRoleName
nested_items.description: The name of the IAM role to be used when making API calls to the Directory Service.

nested_items.name: CopyTagsToSnapshot
nested_items.description: Specifies whether tags are copied from the DB instance to snapshots of the DB instance.

nested_items.name: MonitoringInterval
nested_items.description: The interval, in seconds, between points when Enhanced Monitoring metrics are collected for the DB instance.

nested_items.name: EnhancedMonitoringResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon CloudWatch Logs log stream that receives the Enhanced Monitoring metrics data for the DB instance.

nested_items.name: MonitoringRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the IAM role that permits Neptune to send Enhanced Monitoring metrics to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: PromotionTier
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the order in which a Read Replica is promoted to the primary instance after a failure of the existing primary instance.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB instance.

nested_items.name: Timezone
nested_items.description: Not supported.

nested_items.name: IAMDatabaseAuthenticationEnabled
nested_items.description: True if Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM) authentication is enabled, and otherwise false.

nested_items.name: PerformanceInsightsEnabled
nested_items.description: (Not supported by Neptune)

nested_items.name: PerformanceInsightsKMSKeyId
nested_items.description: (Not supported by Neptune)

nested_items.name: EnabledCloudwatchLogsExports
nested_items.description: A list of log types that this DB instance is configured to export to CloudWatch Logs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DeletionProtection
nested_items.description: Indicates whether or not the DB instance has deletion protection enabled. The instance can't be deleted when deletion protection is enabled. See Deleting a DB Instance.
